review: I think they meant well , but this device works fair at best. I am an A+ certified tech and very good with gadgets. I average about 30mbps. This device just isn`t usable. Skips, lags , freezes, and often times just says unable to cast. Companies are in such a hurry to make a buck they do not explain to the end user that there router must be "perfectly set up". A call to customer care simply told me to change a half dozen settings in my router interface. I did. Still no better. Most people would not even be able to make those changes. This thing was not ready to be released, and Google did not seem interested in refunding me or even exchanging it. Now it`s in a box in my shed with a bunch of extra wires.Wasted my money. However my Roku 3 works great ... as does my smart DVD player and my smart tv.
